analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#294) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#513-535)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#606-620)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#631-643)
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#391-427)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#706-719) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#439-459):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#454-456)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#457)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#753-769) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#766-769)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#674) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#720-724)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#706-719)
	- /unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#710-717
MiniMeTokenI.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#119-122)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/39/0x03698a26a6af930c76ee74a66eed6649fc511e6f.sol#77:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
